description: User clicks the 'start quiz' button on the welcome page to begin the eligibility questionnaire
User views a quiz step (already tracked via analytics.trackStepView)
User completes a quiz step by answering a question (already tracked)
User completes the entire quiz and reaches the result page (already tracked)
User clicks 'Obter meu plano' button to start checkout process - key conversion event
User expands a FAQ accordion to read more information on the result page
User clicks the play button on testimonial video thumbnail
User clicks the WhatsApp contact button to speak with a specialist
User selects their preferred medication type (tirzepatida or semaglutida)
User sets their target weight goal in the goal weight picker
User sets a target date for an important event (wedding, graduation, etc.)
User views their calculated BMI result after entering height and weight
